name: victron-tcp
description: Connect to Victron Energy GX devices via Modbus TCP — read real-time solar, battery, grid, and inverter data from your local network.
long_description: An MCP server that connects to Victron Energy GX devices (Ekrano, Cerbo, Venus GX, etc.) via Modbus TCP. Get direct, low-latency access to 900+ registers across 33 device categories — no cloud required. Built from the official CCGX Modbus TCP register list (Rev 50).

tools.name: victron_system_overview
tools.description: Battery SOC, voltage, current, PV power, grid power, AC consumption, Dynamic ESS status

tools.name: victron_battery_status
tools.description: Detailed battery: SOC, voltage, current, power, temperature, cell data, time-to-go, history

tools.name: victron_solar_status
tools.description: PV voltage, current, power, yield today/yesterday/total, charger state, tracker data

tools.name: victron_grid_status
tools.description: Grid power per phase (L1/L2/L3), voltage, current, frequency, energy counters

tools.name: victron_vebus_status
tools.description: Multi/Quattro: AC in/out power, input current limit, mode, state, alarms, ESS settings

tools.name: victron_tank_levels
tools.description: Tank level, capacity, remaining, fluid type (fuel, fresh water, waste, etc.)

tools.name: victron_temperature
tools.description: Temperature readings with sensor type, humidity, pressure

tools.name: victron_inverter_status
tools.description: Standalone inverter: AC output, state, alarms (Phoenix, Inverter RS)

tools.name: victron_evcs_status
tools.description: EV Charging Station (direct connection): power, status, session energy, temperatures

tools.name: victron_multi_status
tools.description: Multi RS inverter/charger: AC in/out per phase, battery data, charge/inverter state, alarms

tools.name: victron_pvinverter_status
tools.description: AC-coupled PV inverters (Fronius, SolarEdge, ABB): power per phase, energy totals

tools.name: victron_genset_status
tools.description: AC genset controllers: 3-phase AC, engine data, oil/coolant/exhaust temperatures

tools.name: victron_dcgenset_status
tools.description: DC generators: DC voltage/current, engine data, temperatures, error codes

tools.name: victron_alternator_status
tools.description: NMEA 2000 alternators: voltage/current, RPM, field drive %, alarms

tools.name: victron_charger_status
tools.description: AC chargers (Skylla, Blue Smart): up to 3 outputs, charge state, alarms

tools.name: victron_dcdc_status
tools.description: Orion XS DC-DC converter: battery voltage/current/temperature, charge state

tools.name: victron_acload_status
tools.description: AC load / current sensors: per-phase power, voltage, current, energy totals

tools.name: victron_dcenergy_status
tools.description: DC energy meters (SmartShunts in DC meter mode): voltage, current, energy

tools.name: victron_gx_info
tools.description: GX device identity: serial number, relay states, system time

tools.name: victron_digital_inputs
tools.description: Digital input state, type (door, bilge, alarm, generator), pulse count

tools.name: victron_gps_status
tools.description: GPS position: latitude, longitude, altitude, course, speed, satellite count

tools.name: victron_meteo_status
tools.description: Meteo sensors: solar irradiance (W/m²), wind speed, temperatures

tools.name: victron_generator_status
tools.description: GX generator auto start/stop: runtime, start condition, quiet hours, alarms

tools.name: victron_discover
tools.description: Scan unit IDs to find all connected devices and their types

tools.name: victron_read_category
tools.description: Read all registers for any device category by service name

tools.name: victron_read_register
tools.description: Read raw register(s) by address — advanced/debugging

tools.name: victron_list_registers
tools.description: List all available registers for a device category
